name: Specter
description: A malevolent, incorporeal undead creature formed from the soul of a person who met a violent or tragic end, drifting through walls and objects.
memorable: Its life-draining capability and incorporeal movement make it a dangerous and elusive foe.
goals: To drain the life force from the living, feeding on their energy.
relations: Often bound to the location of their death or cursed to wander the world.
environment: Usually encountered in dark and foreboding locations.
strengths: Immune to necrotic and poison damage, as well as a wide range of conditions.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and sunlight, which severely hinders its abilities.
attacks: Life Drain causes necrotic damage and reduces targets' hit point maximum, while Hurl can throw creatures or objects.
most_powerful_ability: Life Drain can not only inflict damage but also reduce the target's maximum hit points, potentially leading to death.
skills: The Specter can be stealthy, often remaining hidden while attacking.
additional_information: Incorporeal Movement allows it to move through creatures and objects.
Sunlight Sensitivity imposes disadvantage on attack rolls and perception checks in sunlight.
It doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep, enhancing its ghostly endurance.
The Retributive Shriek ability can frighten attackers, imposing psychological stress.
It has resistances to several damage types, enhancing survival in combat.
